title: Childs Farm Baby Moisturiser, Baby Soft Scent | Moisturising & Hydrating | Suitable for Newborns with Dry, Sensitive Skin, 500ml

features: Hydrating, mineral oil-free formula, clinically proven to be kind and mild to sensitive skin.
Gently nourish little ones' skin with a mild, comforting baby-soft scent to leave skin feeling moisturised for up to 24 hours.
Supports the natural skin barrier and protects baby's delicate skin.
Contains 98% natural origin ingredients (calculated using ISO standard 16128) including skin-soothing aloe vera, cucumber, cocoa butter and shea butter.
Dermatologist and Paediatrician approved for use on sensitive skin and also suitable for people who may be prone to eczema.
description: Product Description Created specifically to nurture and protect baby’s delicate skin, Childs Farm’s Baby Moisturiser supports the skin’s natural barrier and leaves skin feeling moisturised for up to 24 hours. The fast-absorbing nourishing formula has a comforting baby-soft scent and is clinically proven to be kind and mild to sensitive skin. Enriched with soothing aloe vera and cucumber, and an intensely moisturising blend of cocoa and shea butters. Long-lasting hydration and happy skin guaranteed! • Clinically proven to be kind and mild, and support the skin barrier • Mineral oil-free formula absorbs quickly into skin • Leaves skin feeling moisturised for up to 24 hours • Formulated with 98% natural origin ingredients* • Enriched with skin-soothing aloe vera and cucumber, and a nourishing blend of cocoa and shea butter • Dermatologist and Paediatrician approved • Suitable for newborns and upwards, sensitive skin and also suitable for people who may be prone to eczema • 9 out of 10 parents agree this product leaves their baby’s skin feeling instantly soft and moisturised** • Certified by The Vegan Society and approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme • In a recyclable bottle, made with 100% recycled ocean-bound plastic (excluding label & pump) *natural origin ingredients calculated using ISO standard 16128 **based on a 14 day user trial with 109 participants Ingredients Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Isopropyl Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Polyglyceryl-3 Dicitrate/Stearate, Stearic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Benzyl Alcohol, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Glyceryl Caprylate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract Directions Apply a generous layer of moisturiser twice daily and top up as required. Safety Warning Keep out of reach of children when not in use. External use only. Avoid contact with eyes, if this occurs rinse with water. Take care when applying to newborn skin, stop using this product if irritation occurs. Manufacturer Contact Information Childs Farm Ltd, 3500 Aviator Way, Manchester, M22 5TG, UK. Childs Farm Europe, 'C', Ardilaun Ct., 112-114 St Stephens Green, Dublin, D02 TD28, Eire. See more
